005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.INcNameItem;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
011
012import java.util.List;
013
014import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
015
016import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
017
018@Deprecated(since = "0.7.0")
019public class NcNameAdapter
020    extends AbstractStringAdapter<INcNameItem> {
021  @NonNull
022  private static final List<QName> NAMES = ObjectUtils.notNull(
023      List.of(new QName(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH.toASCIIString(), "ncname"),
024          // for backwards compatibility with original type name
025          new QName(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH.toASCIIString(), "NCName")));
026
027  NcNameAdapter() {
028    // avoid general construction
029  }
030
031  @Override
032  public List<QName> getNames() {
033    return NAMES;
034  }
035
036  @Override
037  public Class<INcNameItem> getItemClass() {
038    return INcNameItem.class;
039  }
040
041  @Override
042  public INcNameItem newItem(Object value) {
043    String item = asString(value);
044    return INcNameItem.valueOf(item);
045  }
046}
